item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (55 points | 13 comments)
2. Hedy: Textual programming made easy (93 points | 14 comments)
3. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (254 points | 61 comments)
4. Hackers get $886,250 for 49 zero-days at Pwn2Own Automotive 2025 (38 points | 15 comments)
5. Once You're Laid Off, You'll Never Be the Same Again (75 points | 41 comments)
6. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (213 points | 79 comments)
7. Show HN: Bagels – TUI expense tracker (125 points | 41 comments)
8. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (468 points | 343 comments)
9. Supercharge SQLite with Ruby Functions (43 points | 11 comments)
10. Two Programming-with-AI Approaches (10 points | discuss)
11. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (207 points | 175 comments)
12. Why Liquidity Matters (24 points | 2 comments)
13. One in four 2020 Tesla Model 3 failed the Danish periodic inspection in 2024 (101 points | 107 comments)
14. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (209 points | 77 comments)
15. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (106 points | 15 comments)
16. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (71 points | 29 comments)
17. OpenJazz is a free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games (128 points | 16 comments)
18. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (370 points | 34 comments)
19. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (165 points | 41 comments)
20. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (150 points | 79 comments)
21. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (210 points | 98 comments)
22. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (77 points | 10 comments)
23. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (135 points | 218 comments)
24. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts (62 points | 14 comments)
25. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (221 points | 69 comments)
26. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (110 points | 21 comments)
27. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)
28. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (429 points | 408 comments)
29. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (290 points | 116 comments)
30. Kansas tuberculosis outbreak is America's largest recorded since the 1950s (377 points | 295 comments)
